about_the_game:
SpeechEngine is a cutting-edge text-to-speech software that revolutionizes the way you experience the world of spoken words. Unlock the power of advanced text-to-speech technology with a range of remarkable features:

[Features]

  • Convert Text to Speech: Transform written words into captivating speech. Whether it's articles, documents, or web content, SpeechEngine brings text to life by flawlessly converting it into spoken words.
  • Listen to Online RSS Content: Simply provide the RSS URL, and SpeechEngine will read out online news and articles for you. Stay updated and informed without the need to read from the screen.
  • Read Files Aloud: Enjoy the convenience of having your text, rich-text, and HTML files read aloud. Experience your content in a new way as SpeechEngine brings it to life through natural-sounding speech.
  • Clipboard Playback: Instantly listen to any text copied to your clipboard. Copy, paste, and hear the content without having to switch between different applications.
  • Scheduled Playback: Set SpeechEngine to read RSS Feeds at specific times. Whether it's a report you need to review or a news article you'd like to catch up on, SpeechEngine has you covered.
  • Extensive Voice Support: Choose from a wide range of computer-generated voices. SpeechEngine supports nearly all the latest and most natural-sounding computer voices available today.

Experience the future of reading with SpeechEngine. From enhancing productivity to making content more accessible, our software brings the power of speech to your fingertips. Download SpeechEngine today and embark on a new journey of effortless listening and learning.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10,11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660Ti, 6 GB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
